instructions: Download Node.js
cd eng/common/tsp-client
npm ci
npm install -g @azure-tools/typespec-client-generator-cli@latest @typespec/compiler@latest
Download and install PowerShell
Download and install GitHub CLI
Install Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/
Download JDK
Set JAVA_HOME environment variable to the JDK installation path
Add JAVA_HOME/bin to your PATH environment variable
Restart your IDE.
Download the latest version of Maven.
Set MAVEN_HOME environment variable to the Maven installation path
Add MAVEN_HOME/bin to your PATH environment variable
Restart your IDE.
npm install -g pnpm
Run pnpm install in the repo root.
Install .NET SDK with version at least higher than defined in global.json file in the repo root.
Download and install the latest Go version of the compiler on https://go.dev/dl/
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports@latest
https://golangci-lint.run/docs/welcome/install/
go install github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/eng/tools/generator@latest
Install Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/
Navigate to your SDK repository root directory
Ensure your virtual environment is activated
python -m pip install eng/tools/azure-sdk-tools[build]
Check that it was installed with azpysdk --help
Navigate to your SDK repository root directory
Ensure your virtual environment is activated
python -m pip install eng/tools/azure-sdk-tools[sdk_generator]
Check that it was installed with sdk_generator --help
Navigate to your SDK repository root directory
Ensure your virtual environment is activated
python -m pip install eng/tools/azure-sdk-tools[ghtools]
Check that it was installed with pip show GitPython
Navigate to your SDK repository root directory
Ensure your virtual environment is activated
python -m pip install pytest
Check that it was installed with pytest --version
